content:
Amazon is a website that allows individuals from all over to purchase a variety of items that may or may not be out of 'reach'. Due to distances, amazon enables people to purchase almost anything as they will ship it right out to you. They have provided people with a service by bringing the products right into their homes and personal spaces, something other competitors cannot do without bringing the customer to them. 

Amazon is VERY effective because it cares of customers. They ensure delivery, provide promotions, and offer a variety of products for purchasing. While the website may seem intimating at first, if you know what you're looking for, its not a problem at all! The website's cons would probably be the unorganized, 'messy' look once the website is first entered, but soon the pros take over and offer people a look into what appeals to them. No longer does distance matter, amazon takes care of it. While I may not shop at Amazon a lot, I would definitely recommend it to a friend.
title: “Amazon is a website that allows individuals from all...”

content:
As movie stores, such as Blockbusters and Movie Galleries, are becoming slim to none in existence, many people have resorted to online options to watch movies. Many people prefer the online option to view their movies because it is often times free or cheaper than renting one at a store. Also having to be home or near a tv at the exact time your favorite tv series airs its newest episode is no longer an issue with these web 2.0 tools since they have both movies and tv episodes for their users. This instant availability has definitely been a major pro for users and is probably one of the main reasons movie stores are going out of business. 
I found three web 2.0 sites that people can use to watch their favorite tv shows and movies. I took into account the websites' affordability, accessibility, reliability, and more to create my reviews. Amazon's instant videos are very easy to navigate. There is a search bar and also categories to make it easier for the user to find what they are looking for. Another pro is that the prices for each movie or tv episode is clearly displayed. Amazon Prime is an option the site offers in which you can become a Prime member for $79 a year which allows you to have access to thousands of free movies and episodes that are have no additional fee as compared to having to make a purchase each time you decide to use Amazon instant videos. A major con is that there are no free options to this site and that there must be some kind of purchase made before watching an episode or movie. However the cost is relatively cheap and affordable. I would recommend this website.
title: “As movie stores, such as Blockbusters and Movie Galleries,.....”

content:
Always the go-to place when shopping. A few small issues remain such as sorting by price which basically doesn't work, and also searches tend to bring up many not so relevant results. They also collect sales tax in New York. My note about sales tax follows:

Amazon COLLECTS sales tax; they do not CHARGE sales tax. Even if Amazon would not collect it, you would still be obligated by law to pay. It's just that no one actually does and so the states are going after the sellers to collect. Most states will have a section on the tax return where the taxpayer is supposed to indicate the amount of goods purchased for which no sales tax was paid - and then pay the tax.

The issue is that if a seller does not have nexus in a certain state, they can basically tell the state to shove off since the state has no jurisdiction over them. The state would then have the option of banning the company from doing business there but then would run the risk of having the Interstate Commerce Commission come afer them, not to mention violating Federal and possibly even Constitutional laws.

It basically comes down to a game of chicken between the states and the companies where the state tries to show that the company has nexus there and the company tries to show that it doesn't. Amazon is the biggest target due to its size and potential tax revenue to the states. They gave in to New York and is slowly caving in to other states. This will go on until the Federal Government gets involved and Congress passes some type of law governing the collection of sales tax. Or a case may make it to the Supreme Court with the same effect.
title: “Always the go-to place when shopping”

When it started to get more well known, my aunt began getting us gift certificates to Amazon.com for Christmas.  Although it's hard to find updated clothing, I still find lots of cute shoes, electronics, books, and camping gear for myself.  They also have pretty quick delivery.  I would just be sure to research the item, where it is comming from, and check all reviews before purchasing.

title: “As everyone already knows, very reliable website with...”

content:
I love Amazon.com. I have been buying from them for the past 10 years and have not have much problems. Sure, once in a blue moon I get a wrong item, but I think it was only like twice in 10 years, still a very good record! I love that they have a lot of variety and other buyers to buy it from. From books to lotion, almost anything you can think of. But the best part for me is that if I ever want a good product review, I can just go on Amazon, search if they have it, and then read the reviews of other users. It has saved me many times from making the wrong decision! 

Buying from the individual sellers can be more tricky, not all of them ship as fast and you don't get the free shipping plus they make more mistakes in shipments than Amazon do. It is especially a problem when you are ordering multiples of the same item. Sometimes the sellers charge you the shipping fee per item. Meaning $4.99 per hand lotion, but if you buy 2 bottles, they will charge you $4.99 x 2, which then adds up to be a lot. Sometimes the shipping can negate any savings that you will get and it may be better to buy from other sites. 

   But I like the fact that Amazon will refund your money eventhough the seller ignores you after you have returned the wrong or defective item, as long as you have proof of delivery or some kind of delivery confirmation of course. Plus, even the sellers have ratings like ebay, so they make more effort to offer better customer service to avoid getting dinged on ratings. 

  Overall a great site!
title: “I love Amazon.com”

content: If you shop wisely you can get good deals and they have, by FAR, the best customer service of any of the big box online retailers.  Also you can get some really great FREE MP3 music from up and coming artists from their MP3 store.

content:
My fiancee and I routinely order all manner of goods from Amazon.com.  

First the pros:

1. Great selection: 

We've ordered everything from roto-tillers, books and MP3s to a garment bag for her wedding dress, all at prices that are better than nearly every reputable retail outlet.

2. Solid packaging: 

Unlike most sellers, we haven't run into any issues with damage due to inadequate protection in shipping.

3. Good Marketplace:

A wide variety of accredited sellers, giving you even more comparison and shopping power, all on one site.

Although the overall experience has been good, I have a few minor issues to note:

1.Beware free shipping:

This is kind of a crap-shoot.  Sometimes, you'll have your items in a few days, however, there is no rhyme or reason to what gets shipped in a timely fashion.  We've had an order of several books shipped from CA arrive in MA in two days, and we've had electronics shipped from KY take nearly 3 weeks to the same address.  If you need the items quickly, ignore the free shipping option, and decide if the cost to have the items shipped quickly offsets the slightly lower price.  For example, the last round of electronics was slightly cheaper, because of the free shipping, on amazon.com than on newegg.com, with newegg's shipping costs.  However, had we ordered them from newegg, we'd have had them in 3 days, and amazon to 20. 

2. Be careful with one-click ordering:

Although useful, and I think required to order MP3 files, make sure you shut this back off.  I accidentally pre-ordered a book using one-click, and didn't even realize it until the book showed up 2 months later!

3. Read the reviews of non-amazon sellers:

Although the marketplace is great, make sure you check into the reviews of any non-amazon seller on the site.  There are some shady sellers out there, but at least amazon leaves the bad reviews up, unlike some sites (Virgin Mobile and Beckett come to mind)
title: “My fiancee and I routinely order all manner of goods...”

Also the pricese seemed reasonable until of course it added up with shipping, and i saw the same products at my local target two days later at a cheaper price, what a let down.

content:
There are some things I like about this site, and other things I don't like. 

A while ago, I bought some books from amazon. One book never arrived. The company I bought it from just said that they had shipped it, so I couldn't get a refund. The book never arrived. 

Amazon was unwilling to get involved. They just told me to talk with the seller. Different reviewers get different community ratings, but it is still sometimes risky. Amazon doesn't accept any liability.

I do like that they have movies you can download instantly. You can rent or buy. Itunes takes forever to download, so this is a great alternative. I use netflix, but you can't watch everything instantly on netflix. I wish though that amazon made it easier to search their database. It is a bit difficult to navigate.

All in all, they have some good services. I would be careful though buying from 3rd parties.
title: “There are some things I like about this site, and other...”

content:
Amazon has an enormous selection, and is very reliable. However, I have two main issues with it:
1. Shipping outside the U.S. is unbelievably expensive, especially considering how long it takes the products to arrive. It sometimes doubles (!) the price of your purchase. I lived in Europe for a few years and when I needed books I ordered through other sites because I did not want to pay that much for shipping.
2. Amazon sellers do not ship outside the U.S., whereas on eBay, for example, you can sellers who do.
title: “Amazon has an enormous selection, and is very reliable”

I've ordered from Amazon since 2006, and I usually order books for my classes. They ship pretty quickly. My shipments usually arrive about 3-4 days (at most a week) after I order. I always try to get their free shipping by ordering over $25, but right now I have the prime account (free for students) w/amazingly fast shipping.

My one complaint is that if you send a present & don't opt to have it wrapped, they put the note in the box with the present. I thought the note would be a sticker on the box, but it's not. By the way, their shipping is through Fedex.

Overall, I'm pretty satisfied.

content:
1. Video On Demand: they are trying to compete with netflix/itunes/etc, but here is the problem...while they do have a great selection and reasonable prices the quality of the video cannot even begin to compare to that of netflix or itunes right now. Plus they somehow lack the ability to buffer the video, so if your connection slows during playback the entire video stops. This never has happened to me on netflix or itunes. Did I mention this was on a T1 line? They give you the option to download the movie to your PC if the connection is too slow, but here is the catch, if you started watching the video already you have to pay AGAIN to download the video. So make sure you test out their connection before you pay for their VOD services, my T1 line was too slow for them. I give them a meh rating as of 12/2010 but hope in the future they get their act together. They  clearly rolled this out before it was ready in hopes to gain market share of the VOD services. 

2. Kindle: here I give amazon a full heart, for books they are doing it right. Very seemless and easy to use. Almost magical in the way you can be reading a book within minutes. 

3. books/DVDs: here again they deserve a full heart. fast service and I do much of my xmas shopping here.

content:
It is 1914 in Hollywood and the craze there is the "flickers", silent motion pictures.  The biggest star is Mary Pickford, "America's Sweetheart".  With her long golden curls and the sweetest smiles, her fans adore her.  Mary has been sole support of her mother and siblings since she was 8 years old and she will do anything to keep her popularity and wrung on the ladder of success.  Never had time for a childhood, or an education, Mary has strong work ethics and is savvy in charming her powerful bosses who rule Hollywood.
When she meets Frances Marion, a "wanna be writer" for the Silver Screen, Mary tries to talk Frances into becoming an actress but fails.  They become close friends and form a personal and professional bond that lasts a lifetime.  They  become trailblazers fighting for women's rights in the film industry, and both achieve awards, power, the love of a lifetime,  and great wealth.

Mary Pickford married handsome mega-star, Douglas Fairbanks and they became the Royal Couple.  They lived at Pickfair, the elegant 18 acre estate in Beverly Hills.  They entertained often and lavishly but it was not the quiet, peaceful, together forever life, Mary dreamed of.  In the end, Mary lost Fairbanks and lived at Pickfair alone as a recluse.
Fran Marion, too, had the love of her life, marrying Fred until he passed away.  Fran became the highest paying screenwriter in Hollywood.

 A dedicated fan of Melanie Benjamin,  two of her books, "THE AVIATOR'S WIFE;, and 'THE LAST CHRISTMAS IN PARIS', are two of my favorites..  Ms. Benjamin writes sterling historical fiction and her research is impeccable.  Films have always been of keen interest to me and GIRLS IN THE PICTURE is a riveting story that takes us both in front of the camera and behind the scenes with a candid description of the fascinating happenings of that era and the sensational people who lived it.  My admiration for both Mary Pickford and Frances Marion for never giving up but reaching the heights but not without heartbreak.  This book is highly recommended by me.  You will love it.  I did!

My thanks to Random House e-newsletter giveaway that I was lucky to win.  Thank you and Thank you to Melanie Benjamin for another winner.  Bravo!
title: “1914 HOLLYWOOD "FLICKERS" STAR MARY PICKFORD AND SCREENWRITER FRANCES MARION”

content: I have been an Amazon enthusiast for years now, I have been an Amazon Prime member for about two years an I absolutely love it! I got introduced to Amazon from Facebook from Freebie Mom who has giveaways an sweepstakes's posted, she had what she called bouncy boxs which I later found out are Amazon Giveaways, which I have won a lot of great things on! Since then i have been an avid Amazon fan,I soon signed up for Prime which is only $10.99 a month an for those with EBT it's only $5.99 a month! Their website has so many awesome products an companies from around the world, I could spend hours an day's looking around, I always find a deal an what I want! Being a Prime member means I get two day shipping on qualifying products and so much more! Prime also includes free tv shows an movies on the Amazon Prime Vidoe app! There's also free music an books too, they also have a sample program that turns your money into sample credit to go towards more samples! I have connected with many great brands on Amazon, I have gotten into reviewing products for free to post my review to Amazon! There is no limit to all you can do on Amazon! I really like that you can connect directly to a seller if you want or need, its great to be able to do that. I can use gift cards from my account an send an receive money on Amazon too! I can't imagine life with out Amazon now! It has become such a large part of my life, it has brought me to many new experiences an people! When you shop on Amazon you know you are with a place you can trust, they do all they can to ensure you get what you want, if there is any issue between you an a seller Amazon is right there to help, call or email an someone will get it sorted fast an most of the time you get extra incentives for any troubles! The staff an site are both fantastic to interact with! This website truly cares for its customers an its company, such compassion an humanity here! I don't know what I would be doing now if I didn't have my Amazon account! Prime has changed my life for the best! Their site is easy to navigate, very simple an satisfying! Your account has everything you need to make Amazon your second home lol you can track orders an write reviews from your account, you can manage your payment options an read messages about your orders an such! You can do so many things an it's all nice an organized for you, it's so simple to understand an to do all you want on your account! Every time I make a purchase I feel safe knowing my package is well taken care of, they email an message you every step of the way so you know where your order is, they take pride in their work an it shows in their company/website everyday! I definitely know that if ever I had any issue Amazon will have my back an do all they can to right it! I have not had many issues with Amazon really, which is a plus, they run a wonderful site with great opportunities for everyone! So many starting out look to Amazon to help build their brand name, there are so many sellers and buyers out there it's amazing to have Amazon in the middle to help both ends! I feel confident that Amazon not only deeply cares for its customers, companies an own interests but they deeply care for how the world is around us! Making shopping a better experience for all involved, carrying all we could ever want an need at all price ranges that everyone can afford, they really help everyone! I will forever be a huge Amazon fan! I just can't rave enough for all they do an have done for people! I highly recommend Amazon to everyone! You will be so happy an excited to be a part of Amazon, you will be proud an rave like me! I hope you check out all Amazon has to offer for yourself an see what I'm talking about!

content:
Amazon by far, has the best prices, shipping time and return policy of an vendor online. When I find a product I want to purchase, among all other sites, I add Amazon to the list. 9.5  times out of 10 they have the product at a lower price. Even if it's a few dollars more, I order from them because of superior customer service and return policy.
 The first action I take is reading the reviews of consumers who have purchased the  item to see if it's something I really want.. If that passes the test, I order with confidence knowing that Amazon stands behind every product they sell. I have purchased many items from them in the last 4 years. On several occasions the product was not what I expected or failed to perform. Each time, following the instructions given, I was able to return the item with a full refund. One time, because of a misunderstanding, Amazon even offered and sent me the product for free as an apology. 
The shipping time is also a major plus and packing is done with great care.

content: I came to online purchasing late in life. I was very hesitant to put my credit card info out on the web. Plus I always preferred dealing with brick and mortar merchants. If I had an issue  I could walk in to the store and resolve my problem. Who knew how online stores would handle customer service. Well Amazon quickly sold me on online purchasing. Both of my kids and most of my grandkids are in other states. Anyone who who has tried to ship anything knows that shipping costs are outrageous. So I tried making a few purchases from Amazon. I always bought enough to get free shipping. I didn't have Prime at first. The first time I had to contact customer service I was so pleased with outcome I decided to stay with them. I'll give you an example of Amazon's customer service. I was given a Kindle Fire as a gift. It was purchased from a Major Electronic Chain Store. Within the first couple of weeks I started having an issue with it. I phoned the Major Electronic Chain Store and spoke to one of their customer service people. I explained the issue to her, giving her the date of purchase and the fact that I did have the receipt. Her response was that I would have to bring it in and if it was something covered under the warranty they would look as t it. But if not then I was pretty much SOL.  I had explained in detail to her what the issue was. It did not have anything to do with abuse of the Kindle. It had a clear operating issue. She just kept to the same not interested attitude.  I told her to not worry about it. I would call Amazon. But that I would never set foot in her store again again. To this day I have not. I did call Amazon. I made it very clear that the Kindle had been purchased from this other very unhelpful store. They did not care. They sent me a shipping label to return it to Amazon and as shipped me a brand new Kindle. Every time I have ever had to phone Amazon's customer service they have gone above and beyond to make sure that whatever issue I am having is solved. I do have Prime now and I HIGHLY recommend it to everyone. I can spend over a hundred dollars shipping one box to my kids. So the cost of Prime is a bargain. Not only do I have free shipping all year, but free books, movies, and all kinds of other things. I love this company.
title: “Every Business Should Be Run This Way!!!!”

I've had DOA items which they replaced on receipt of the item. Interestingly if it's a small low value item they let you keep the defective unit :) 

Nice people. My company had a business account and their business support is very responsive. (I'm sure regular support is great too).

Edit: I should probably mention they use something close to slave labor, with terrified employees peeing in bottles as they are afraid to take bathroom breaks. I'm not sure I want to shop with them, if this is the cost...

My only concern is they are supposedly treating staff badly. I would rather pay a bit more to know that staff are treated ethically and paid well.

content: I have been using Amazon for many years, and I must say that shopping with Amazon is not only convenient, but they usually have items found elsewhere at a lower price!! My daughter has Amazon Prime, and I think that this service is completely a worthwhile investment. Amazon Prime assures that usually anything marked with a "Amazon Prime Symbol" will ship to you in two days or less, and the shipping is completely free. Many of the Amazon Prime products for sale also come with "Free Returns". Let me explain. If you make a purchase with Amazon Prime, and the product is listed as "Free Returns"........you have absolutely no risk in placing your order. When your order arrives with two-day free shipping, and it isn't what you thought it was, or it doesn't fit properly, you just request a return. This then takes you to a page to print out a shipping label for free return shipping of your order, with a refund quickly following the return. How can you beat that for worry-free online shopping??? The pricing on Amazon, on almost any product you can think of, is for the most part, less than purchasing from a brick and mortar store, and certainly less expensive than making your purchase on a different website!!! It pays to know your prices first....as Amazon is sometimes (rarely) the same price or a higher price than other competitors. I use traditional stores to go and touch and check-out an item.....then I go to Amazon to place my order for the same exact product at a substantial savings!!! Amazon is awesome!!! Don't just take my word for it......give it a try!!! Go with Amazon Prime......and if you are not happy with the pricing or service, Amazon will refund your Prime membership in full....no questions asked!!!! Furthermore, there are products on Amazon that you would never find for sale in a normal, run of the mill store. The variety of similar products gives you a wider choice of exactly what you want, and exactly what you don't want!!! For example, go to Home Depot to purchase an electrical meter. You may have two or three choices....that's it folks. Now, go onto Amazon.....type in electric meter....and you may happen to have anywhere from ten to fifty choices with complete descriptions and directions. And, I can almost guarantee that you can find an electric meter at a substantially lower price!!!!! Got to love it!!!!!!
title: “THIS IS THE PLACE TO BUY ALMOST ANYTHING!!!”

And you have the Right to ask for a USA based Customer Service Rep.!
Or Ask to speak to a Supervisor!

content: Last night, a little after 9 pm, November 8, 2017, I ordered a 2 pack flashlight item from Amazon.com. It was Amazon fulfillment item. I was instantly charged for the balance of the item, $17.40 and my Amazon gift card balance of $3.58 was applied to the purchase total. I canceled within the hour, the $3.58 gift card balance was restored, but the completed transaction charge was not reversed and will not be reversed, because THREE CSRs have told me that it is not possible that I was charged, that it is just an authorization hold and will be removed when my bank's policies prescribe.

content: When I first got into amazon, I was skeptical about online shopping, But the way they treat customers and how easy the process is swayed me. I was first acquainted with the website after purchasing a kindle fire HDX 7 inch and have stuck with them for years. Not only is the process simple and fast, the customer service and warranty service is quick and hassle free. You can increase the speed of which your package arrives to you by either subscribing to amazon prime for free two-day shipping(along with other benefits) or you can increase it's speed by purchasing higher levels of shipping. Not only is it good as a marketplace, but it allows us to communicate with who is going to sell what to us, read customer reviews, get special offers, etc... Even their third party companies are good, I recently purchased a laptop from Woot!, this is a company with the amazon guarantee which meant that it was trustworthy. The one thing I have mixed feelings about is both good and bad in its own way. The amazon appstore offers many apps that you would find in other appstores, some that you get for free if they are listed in amazon underground. Another thing that I love about this appstore are the amazon coins, not only do they allow me to get in app purchases for cheaper than usual, when making a purchase, certain apps give credit back. The only problem is that it lacks a lot of the apps that you would easily find in the google playstore or the apple equivalent. Overall, I believe amazon is a great company that finds a way to make sure the customer is satisfied.

content: Today, many companies are going virtual to keep up with the times. It improves speed and accessibility for all consumers. Although there are many different companies, Amazon takes the cake. Amazon is the best online retailer because of the simplicity to use their website, the speed of their deliveries, and most of all their affordability. To get started with Amazon, all you need is an email and a PayPal, credit, or debit card to make a purchase. They walk you through the entire process making sure you know exactly what you are doing. To shop, all you do is click on what you want and put it in the shopping cart. Once you are finished, you go to your cart and check out. They have standard shipping for most items but if you sign up for Amazon Prime, some items get free speedy delivery, next day delivery, or even same day delivery. Every day there are deals that you can get just by going on their deals page. If you are an Amazon Prime member, you are eligible to get discounts and deals just for being a member. Amazon is the best online retailer because they know how to use the internet to their advantage. They build their site to be user-friendly, they make deliveries as hassle-free as possible, and they keep their prices at reasonable levels. Best of all, they work towards making each customer happy and work hard for each and every one.
title: “Easy, fast, and a friend to your wallet.”

content:
My wife and I purchase from Amazon on a regular basis. Even when there has been an issue with an order Amazon has resolved the issue promptly. I have got an incorrect or defective product from them and Amazon has immediately shipped out a new or correct product and never asked for the defective product to be shipped back. They would ask for a picture of the problem and either issue a credit or immediately ship a replacement.

I had an order that I had paid for overnight shipping but when I received the shipping confirmation it showed standard shipping so I immediately called Amazon who shipped the entire order again overnight and told me to keep, donate, or dispose of the duplicate order. I have never ran across such outstanding customer service anywhere else. 
We have the Prime membership so usually on purchase Amazon products and not from 3rd party sellers so I can't say much about other sellers on Amazon but can say Amazon itself is amazing. I see why their company only continues to grow every year.

content:
TWO PART REVIEW;
1) Sellers of gently used goods, lend me your ears! 

      NO longer do you have to wait for an auction to end and pray that your item fetched at least the cost to ship it to its new owner. Amazon is just like being able to sell your items among the premium giants of the online retail businesses........! AT A NEARLY RETAIL PRICE!!!   (That's right I s%&t you not my friends. I wouldn't lie to you, I personally swear by Amazon sellers market and have made close to ten thousand dollars selling used items that I referbished from various sources. Items that would have gone for at least 25%-50% less on ebay and even lower on Facebook or Craigslist.)  Did the Facebook reference catch your atention, nearly everyone has Facebook and lover the local buys. But the price is garage sale level and let's face it the market is limited to a few thousand at most.  Amazon is nationwide/global and Amazon allows you you view all other products that are the same as the one you are listing and price your according to your competitors prices.    That means if anyone in the entire country is interested in a product that you happen to be selling you will have play in Amazon.   Quick seller? I am!  And I priced my listings from $1.00-$5.00  below the lowest priced item(which is barely 10%lower than at Walmart or kohl's and even Best Buy) insuring my product would sell to the first frugal consumer interested in the product.    

2)Buyers of o line merchandise! 

         Amazon  has a very strict customer satisfaction percentage requirement for its sellers I think it's like 98.99% positive review rate.  Not like eBay in which u can commit to buy just by wanting to see it in your basket for aditional info and get a negative buyer point.  Untill I buy it I haven't bought it!    Don't tell me because I am looking around I have to buy somthing I don't want anymore or can't really afford.
title: “DON'T SELL ON EBAY!!!, Amazon is a premium online retailer. Buy and sell with confidence.”

I am a fan of Amazon video too but there are sites for tv shows and movies that are better than Amazon. This company truly seems to have everything that I need. They are easy to use and navigate around to find things. They also suggest things for you, which is often very helpful. And, if something isn't right when you receive your goods, the returns are smooth, easy, and okay to do. I am pleased with the service that our family receives from Amazon and will continue to tell others about them and to do business with them myself. I usually order at least three times per week since hardly a day goes by that I don't need something or other. I can't recommend Amazon highly enough to the handicapped.

content:
With the exception that you can accept the following: 
You want free shipping? Meet requirements when you checkout items. Whether it's 25 or 49 dollars. Also check that your items come with the possibility of free shipping, otherwise it will NOT count towards free shipping. (Irritating, I know)
Not all of your products will be delivered when scheduled. I know that may suck, but that is why Amazon allows you to contact sellers to ensure nothing happens to your products along the way.
Some products may never find their way to your home. Which is even more irritating, but the first thing you should do is go on Amazon to contact the seller or file a complaint to Amazon directly. Every time this has happened to me I got promised a full refund within a day or two with no questions asked. (Refunds take time to get to your account. Which implies it will take longer for Amazon to process your refund, it may take up to two weeks to process the full refund)
AND SOME PRODUCTS WILL BE ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE BUT THATS WHY WE MUST READ REVIEWS VERY VERY CAREFULLY AND DEMAND (or ask politely) THAT THE SELLER TAKES THE SAID PRODUCT BACK. 
Some sellers may be very good at making sure you get the product you wanted. Every once in a while I get a card from a seller I buy from, it's handwritten by her, she makes it clear that I can contact her with any questions or concerns about the product. Those types of sellers are the ones that deserve a review, or really any seller that makes sure your product is in ideal condition when it arrives.
Make sure you review! Especially if your experience exceeds or falls below your expectations, honestly a lot of customers look at stars and reviews before they buy a product, be sure to encourage/discourage them accordingly. 

Last note: 
If you decide to purchase a product, make sure it's not overpriced or too cheap.

Overpricing is an obvious issue which I probably don't have to explain
But some products that are underpriced are such terrible quality, and even the sellers might not be all the great either. (That's why you ought to look at reviews!!!!)

I can't recommend this site enough for people who wish to shop online.
title: “It has been an ideal site for me- perhaps for you too”

I also use the Subscribe and Save program for items I use regularly, again you have to watch the prices, because you can't assume that the price is locked in at the price you got when you first ordered it.  I've done Amazon Pantry, but quit that.  The UPS guy comes to my house a lot and I felt sorry for him having to lug those huge, heavy boxes that Pantry stuff is shipped in.  I did like the program, just not enough to give the guy who likes my big, bouncy dog a hernia.  I also love Kindle books and the Audible program.

content: I just love Amazon. I can shop in the convenience of my house, car or a friend's house. When my truck broke down Amazon delivered all the bulky heavy items that are hard to carry on the bus or train. I remembered when the annual membership fee was $79 plus 2 day free shipping which I thought was great, then a few years later the annual fee jumped to  $99 plus the 2 day free shipping which is still great cause I spend twice that every month anyway. For my family it's worth being Prime Members. They have just about anything and everything under the sun. My daughter is on my account too even though we live together. Customer service has always been fantastic if I ever needed them which isn't often maybe 3 times over the past 7 years. When I see something that I want, need or desire I always go to Amazon first. Amazon has not failed my family. I am in the subscribe & save program and Amazon music and video. You get so much for  $99 annual fee and i save alot money on shipping fees , my items are delivered within 2 days. You can't get this anywhere else. FANTASTIC!! Check it out to see if being a Prime Member is good for you and your family.

content:
I've been a Prime member since they began offering memberships and I really can't imagine my life w/o Amazon. Our family uses it for literally everything! 
I still try to price watch and sometimes other sites will have a better price but the determining factors for me are a) how fast can the competitor get items to me and do they charge for shipping b) how easy is it to return or exchange  things with the competitor? 
Amazon will literally do whatever it takes to make you happy. They do not want customers walking away from a purchase unhappy. There have been times when an item quit working or got broken after the 30 day return period and they still did what they could to make it right.  The amount of convenience coupled with their superior customer service brings me back to them time and time again. 
They have a huge selection of everything and they stand behind it all. Amazon Prime is a very well thought out organization that has determined there is great value in repeat business and to keep that business they make sure you're happy. Need to return something? They do all the work - getting you labels, having UPS pick it up etc... they've just really thought it all out and their continually growing business is proof that they're doing things right!
title: “Amazon Prime is Amazing!!”

content: They still set standard for online retailer. I've been a customer for 17 years. Never a hassle. Returns are easy, huge product selection. I look at consumer reviews to get product information.
title: “Amazon”

content: Been using Amazon for years now since 2007 and back then I would have been skeptical. But now I shop with 100% confidence that amazon won't leave my purchases  incomplete. If an item goes missing, is damaged, lost or seller didn't ship on time, I get my refund right away within a day or two. If the item is on back ordered I'm notified instantly before placing it. Their inventory system is immaculate. It's no wonder their stock prices are incredibly high. Their innovative online shopping experience extends to 2 hours shipping with amazon prime NOW. I can't remember the last time driving in traffic and wasting my time at a store. Hands down best online marketplace ever.
title: “Better than the rest, if not the best!”

content: I adore buying via this site! The items sold there are very fashionable and high-quality. When I receive the packages from Amazon I just feel excited!
title: “My bestie ;)”

content: Any time I've ordered books, food, clothes, art supplies, even a part for my daughters car, everything has been packaged well, shipped & delivered on time and received in perfect working order. Now that I'm kind of laid up (waiting for hip surgery in June), I've been ordering all our groceries (except fish & meats) thru Amazon Fresh! WOW is all I can say! Every single thing is truly "fresh" and put in iced boxes so it stays that way. Great options and free delivery if you're a Prime Member. Even after my surgery, I just might continue with this "Fresh". Love the front door delivery (and no one shoving their grocery cart up my backside :(  )

content: I have always loved shopping online; My mother has been using amazon with the paid for subscription for years, and as I grow up I have started to get an income and a financial balance- And I rely on amazon very heavily for anything you could imagine, from phone chargers to Car Parts, cookbooks to college textbooks, art for around the house, presents for relatives and friends, and anything you could imagine! I love the various clothing that they carry, I always check for on amazon because the name brands that I like such as Ralph Lauren Polo are always on sale and other expensive designer. I have saved great money on amazon since I had started my subscription 5 months ago, it has a great variety of products and has a great site-setup to set how much money you would like to spend, what exact name brand you are looking to buy, what size/fit/model of the certain product you are getting, and much, much, more- I only had 1 Problem in the past 5 months with amazon when I had chosen 2-day shipping and I waited 5 days to get it arrived, even though 1 of those days were not business days I still contacted the customer service and explained to them my problem and what the backstory was to why I was so focused on getting it in those 2 days; and in less than 10 minutes I received an email of apology and a refund of the 2-day shipping because of my inconvenience, which made me super happy giving my rating of the customer service aswell a 5/5! And I also got the product in 4 business days without any problems for no charge when if I would have chosen standard shipping I would have waited over 3 weeks!! If you are not an amazon user or subscriber, I would highly recommend you to go and look into that! Have a great day everyone and thank you for reading!
title: “Little Bit of Everything!!”

content:
2 Incidents that demonstrate this for me:

Oct 2016--I ordered a 45 lbs dumbbell. After I checked the tracking notice, the delivery info said 43 lbs. No biggie, but I messaged Amazon that they might update the page and let others know this can happen, a weight be off a pound or two. The rep responded by apologizing, refunding the payment, and telling me to keep the dumbbell. Outstanding.

Feb 2017--Ordered a nice little bookcase from Amazon fulfillment. It came, I assembled it and  the middle shelf--the screws didn't line up right. It's not a huge problems, still have the others shelves, just 4 instead of 5. When I sent feedback to support, the rep offered a full refund if I sent it back or (as it was still functioning and useful) she would refund me half of my purchase. I was appreciative of this.
title: “Whatever faults they have, customer service makes up for it.”

content:
I have always been pleased with my purchases with Amazon. Their deliveries are prompt etc. No problems with returns etc. 

As a seller it is very nerve wracking. They are always changing their rules and sometimes without warning.  Just before Christmas they put a hold on any brand name merchandise. Many of us had hihg end sneakers, sport products etc. All of a sudden we could not sell theses items without an approval requiring a $1000 application to sell brand name but it was not a guaranteed approval. If not approved than you lost the whole $1000 dollars. I did not get stuck with inventory but many of my friends then had to sell on Ebay or some other site. Huge disappoint and financial loss just before Christmas. ??? So for a seller it is a great site to purchase from but for a seller your account can be terminated or put on hold for very minor infractions??? It is a great site but a site to be very careful of if you are a seller.
title: “Great for buyers - sellers?”

content:
Amazon order number : 114-8083188-1541855. 
Macys order number: 1391458161..for those who wish to research the validity of this review.  I was expecting  a shipment from both Macy's and Amazon.com on the same date on about the 15th of March 2017.  I received emails that the items we're delivered but upon getting home from work nothing was on the porch as they usually are and I've been a frequent customer to both companies for years.   I immediately called both and both Macy's and Amazon seemed to understand and show interest in helping however Macy's customer service must be in Vietnam because I could barely understand them.  They both told me I'd be issued a refund so I'm happy at this point.   However at 8pm on this same date the items from Macys showed up on the porch and several days later at about the same time the item from Amazon showed up.  Obviously a delivery error because the UPS info noted left with lady but no lady lives at my address.  Although unsure where it was left they we're honest enough to return it to me.   I called both Macy's and Amazon immediately to correct the credits and here's what I found.  Amazon actually was truthful and issued the refund while Macy's showed no record of any refund and days later sent me a letter saying because of the shipper note (left with lady) they we're unable to issue a refund.   Good thing this mysterious lady that they spoke of at an unknown address and no signature was honest.  My point is it's good to know if there is a problem Amazon is willing to help while Macy's on the other hand will not be getting anymore orders simply because they chose to blame the customer for the shipping error.  I'm sure no one at Macys even thought to check my order history and see the thousands of dollars I've spent there over the years.   Sorry Macys.   Youre done until you care for customer. I'd rather shop Amazon now.

content: I have amazon prime and there is nothing more convenient than being able to find a product on amazon and order it with free shipping. They have almost anything you could ever want! I'm disabled and it's hard to walk around a store to shop. Being able to get so many things from amazon and receive them in a couple days is immensely helpful for me. The amount I've saved on shipping has more than paid for my prime membership every year. When they do mess up, their service people are willing and able to handle the problem for you. Recently they shipped out an item of furniture after I'd canceled the order. Their automatic return system wanted to charge me shipping to send it back. Five minutes chatting with a CSR and I had a free pickup scheduled for the large, bulky item. Then their automatic system deducted shipping from the credit for the item (their error in shipping a canceled order). Another few minutes chatting with a CSR and I had full credit. Their CSRs can bypass their automatic system to give you quick, efficient, and polite assistance. There's no "I have to send this to a manager to look into." I appreciate that. Amazon has quality products, service, and people with very reasonable prices. I love them.

Are they perfect, no but what is so great about Amazon is they fix it. Easy returns, discounts and they will work with your situation.  Their customers services is excellent and fast!  I can call or email and get answers when I need and want them.  They definitely are a front runner in this business.  I have tried others now and again and always come back to Amazon.  You just can't go wrong!

content: I buy everything on Amazon! I have a prime subscription too. It's so nice to be able to remember something you need so u jump online to Amazon and order it and it shows up quicker than it would have been to find time to run to the store and get it. They even have these dash buttons for a bunch of stuff like laundry soap for example so when u are running low on laundry soap u just tap the button that u stick on the washer and it automatically connects to Amazon and places the order and then a day or two later it shows up. Too awesome! U pay like $4.95 for each of the buttons but once u place an order for the first time u get that back as a $4.95 discount so the buttons are technically free after your first order. Anyways, Amazon has everything! I love it. I have probably spent over $100,000 buying almost everything for my house, car, and family from the site. The prices are 98% of the time better than anywhere else online and it couldn't be any easier to return a wrong or damaged package (assuming u order it through prime). If anyone doesn't use Amazon as a shopping choice then u are missing out on one of the best shopping options of the new era and it only keeps getting better as the progress. Whether it's a part for your car or a toy for your kid or a product for your lawn, you should always be checking out Amazon.com!!! PS... I didn't get paid to say any of this and I rarely do reviews but for Amazon I would post a review just like this anytime!!!

content:
I've been using it for years and it has been a lifesaver. When I need stuff for my dog that I can't find anywhere else or I can leave the house and I need a book for my daughters School. Plus it's half the price of going to Barnes & Noble and you save gas...
One serious note: in the past 6 month I've noticed that probably 50% of the products on the house from China I mean they act like it's an American company they just broker in China so many of these things phone batteries 2 printer ink. So you must be very careful because things are changing on that website and the quality is not top quality like it used to be. Sometimes they let you know it & sometimes they don't. A Sure way to find out is a good part of the stuff with an 8-10 day lead time is probaly/coming off a boat from China. So don't let the extremely low priced items fool you. There's always a catch. AMAZON SHOULD be careful because Trump will start banning them & then ruin it for all the Amazon Great customers, like myself :-( I know I can't live without them so I hope they shape up..on a positive note they offer a chance to return items for free. Customer service is very good I mean you don't get a real person but you do it online and they answer promptly. Rarely, do they deny a return. Even though it's free to do, it's definitely a hassle packing it up and going to UPS or whatever... still I feel they are a 5 star company.
title: “I love Amazon.com Prime”

With the variety of items they have, the low prices and great customer service, I'm a very loyal customer!

content: Amazon has lots of stuff, and most of the time the price is at or near the best you'll find.  But what really sets them apart is the customer service provided *by Amazon*.    Of course, Amazon offers items from its own warehouse, but they also offer the same items from third party distributors.  EVEN THEN, if there is a problem,my experience is that Amazon will take care of you. I've had to return items - Amazon paid return shipping.   I've gotten items that were defective and the seller disappeared.  Amazon gave me a refund.  I've had warranty issues with third party seller - Amazon made good on my purchase.  THe bottom line is that I am pretty sure I can rely on Amazon to correct any problems, at their expense, not mine.  That makes them a great online store.
title: “The best part is the customer service”

content:
I have been ordering from Amazon for several years and have found them to be a reliable company.  Their delivery time is outstanding.  I do admit, I have found it I choose my item "fulfilled by Amazon" I have a really fast turnaround time.  There have been times when I must choose from a seller directly.  
    ALWAYS read the reviews on the seller you choose, they are usually helpful, you will be able to tell the ones that are actual reviews and not just *itch sessions from the consumer.  The reviews give you a very good idea of how the seller responds to problems, the quality of the items and if they stand behind their guarantee.
    I always leave a review for sellers, since I occasionally sell  on Amazon I know how valuable the feedbacks are to a seller.
Judy in Alabama, Oct 2016
title: “Never had any real problems”

content:
I was very excited to receive this wireless headset because of the wireless Bluetooth feature. The sound is great both listening to music and making phone calls. Easy transition from listening to music to answering a phone call. They are very comfortable to wear.

It comes with a small portable case that allows you to store the headphones and the charging cable together. The charging cable can be used with any USB charger. It also comes with three sizes of ear pads, which is nice because I have very small ears and not all headsets fit me well. They charged quickly and the bluetooth was easy to sync to my iPhone. This headset can be used with any smart phone.

The product arrived in a small, sturdy box, form fitting box which kept the product secure and undamaged. Easy to follow instructions included.
title: “Excellent value priced bluetooth headset”

content:
I buy virtually everything online (from TVs to automobile tires, to door hardware, to food items), and Amazon has been an essential tool for getting what I want easily, quickly, and usually at or near the best possible prices. There's no one out there doing as good a job of supplying almost any product imaginable than Amazon.com. But....you don't always get the best price, and all too often their collection of sales tax makes them uncompetitive. 
So I use Amazon to easily find exactly what I want, and then I make sure there aren't less expensive purchase options available within Amazon. And that's what makes Amazon such a great site and tool--they help you find the cheapest deals if you use them wisely. For example, after searching the most obvious prices available on Amazon, you need to find and click on the Available from These Sellers link to see your options. Those options almost always allow you to place an order with independent 3rd party sellers who don't collect sales tax, and many also provide free shipping, or qualify for Amazon Prime shipping benefits. 
But don't stop there, you also need to click the See All Buying Options button. That's where you may find your item being sold with free 2-day shipping, for example, (which might otherwise never have been available if you hadn't searched a bit further).  
I also have an Amazon Prime membership which saves time and money on shipping while also giving me Amazon Prime movies and TV programs, including some great original series. 
Is everything less expensive using Amazon? No, it's not, but searching that item within Amazon and outside of Amazon provides you almost effortless comparative pricing. So deciding where to get the best overall deal becomes extremely easy. And whenever I'm in doubt and prices are almost identical, I'll usually play it "safe" by going with Amazon so that I can easily return an item on a hassle-free basis. That in itself has been one of the best features of Amazon.com.
Remember that Amazon makes buying online extremely easy, but it's real value is as a price comparison tool for finding the best deal possible in the shortest amount of time. Although Amazon.com may not always prove to be the least expensive online seller, the website makes finding the best possible deals incredibly easy. Add to that their hassle-free return policy, and they absolutely deserve the highest ratings possible.
title: “Best overall shopping experience online”

content: I have been shopping on Amazon.com for years. I started using the site every time I wanted to buy a book. After a while, as Amazon grew and started to sell different types of merchandise, whenever I needed something it was the first place I thought of to go to and find what I needed. These days I hardly ever shop in brick and mortar stores. And anytime I need something I check Amazon first to see if I can find exactly what I am looking for. I don't look elsewhere once I find it, because I know I am not going to find better prices elsewhere. Even when I have purchased items that did not meet my needs in reality, returns are as easy as going to your account, finding the order, and let Amazon know what you are interested in returning. Put the item into appropriate packaging and send it back.  My suggestion?... If you have not yet shopped on Amazon.com, don't waist any more time reading other reviews...It is a great website, easy to navigate, so go ahead...get to it!!
title: “My Go-To for Everything I Ever Need”

content: I have bought so many things from Amazon over the years and hope to keep using the website forever. I ordered a costume for my brother that was ill fitting and not the same fabric it was advertised as. After contacting the seller he said we couldn't return the product because the package was opened, when we sent him another message demanding to return the product because we couldn't look at the product without opening the package and that's the only way we knew it was wrong,  the seller said we could return it for a 50% refund.  I contacted Amazon promptly to file a claim and not only did they make sure the money was refunded the same day, they told we didn't have to send it back because the seller wouldn't provide a prepaid shipping return label.  They respond quickly and go above and beyond. I would recommend them to anyone!

content:
OK, I am UK based so how effective Amazon marketing strategy in other places is I cannot comment but in the UK Amazon is first class. There is however conditions which has been fulfilled with any purchase from Amazon. Those conditions are: 
1) I really want the item.
2) the item does have have variables such as size or colour.
Following this self imposed policy has meant that in the many years of dealing with Amazon, I have never had to return anything. Even with the third party suppliers the deliveries have always been prompt, well packed and as ordered with no billing issues.
May I also give another policy I use. The purchasing of goods is fraut with risks and dangers in a shop but if one thing goes wrong online I will not use that supplier again. So far Amazon has been a pleasure to deal with.

content: Amazon Prime is a great asset. Free two-day shipping on your purchases, but even better is the free Amazon Music. An almost endless selection of music which can be made into playlists for every occasion. Once setup, you can access your Amazon Music through a wide variety of devices (TV's; computers; cellphones; tablets; etc), wherever you go. As if that were not enough, you also have access to a massive library of videos, including movies and your favorite television programs. For $99 for an entire year, it makes a wonderful gift, especially for someone who likes to shop online, enjoys music, and movies.They will use your gift year-round!

content: We have been Amazon customers for many years, and have never had a problem.  The selection of products and services are amazing!  They have upped the minimum price for free shipping over the years, but I guess that's to be expected as costs rise.  However, there are still sellers on Amazon that offer free shipping, and depending on where you live, sometimes no tax.  You can pay a variety of ways, get e-books instantly, and make wish lists easily.  You can even order with one click if you choose to set up that option.  Amazon doesn't always have the lowest prices, but often does, so check around online and even in your local stores before you order.  Some businesses in your town may even price match Amazon if you ask and their policy permits it.  One thing I have noticed is that prices can fluctuate wildly, sometimes even the same day, so if you find what you want at a great price you might ought to get it--it might cost more tomorrow (or less)!  There is almost no category of merchandise Amazon or one of their sellers doesn't offer, so browse and refer to them often.

content: I'm a senior citizen and my entire extended family lives out of state. Birthdays, Christmas, Chanukah (we're a mixed-religion family), anniversaries... Amazon has anything I want to send as a gift at any time, it's all been eligible for Prime, and the prices are great! Shipping is free, the items get to the recipients in two days and, every time I order, Amazon donates to the charity I designated. The cost of Prime membership pays for itself in about seven months of every year just with the savings in shipping and handling. Furthermore, although I don't have a tablet or a smartphone, and don't download anything on my PC, my family does so, when they visit, that part of my Prime is put to good use.

content: A while back I had ordered a similar product for my wife's car and my mother in law decided she just absolutely had to have one too. As a pleasant surprise for her we ordered her this one, and she loves it. They have 3 dogs and any given day they are taking them in the car to the petstore or vet for whatever reason and this so far has proven to be a lifesaver for her. The hammock feature helps keep the dogs from sliding down into the footrest area, while also providing a slight barrier to help keep them from climbing into the front of the car. The fact that dog hair is not getting all over her nice leather seats doesn't hurt either. While I did receive this item at a discount on the grounds that I would review it up receipt and use I can honestly say that my opinions in regards to it have not been swayed by that fact. This is a quality solution for a unique problem that I strongly recommend to anyone with animals.
title: “Topist Dog Cat Seat Cover WaterProof & NonSlip Backing Cover with Pet Car Seat Belt for Cars,”

content: We use it on a daily basis. Amazon makes shopping a pleasure. You have to find a dressing room, undress to try on clothing (when the dressing room is usually a mess from prior custormers use), get dressed and go to checkout where the sales person will try to get you to sign up for the store' card (when you already have Visa or Mastercard, etc). Then you have to trek back to your car and deal with traffic going home, Amazon eliminates all the above aggravation (you can sit in your "PJ's) drink your coffee, eat your snack and browse at any hour day or night, compare all your items of interest, make a decison, pay with your card, then click to complete the purchase. content: I have been using Amazon for about 15 years now and I have seen Amazon go through a number of changes. I am currently an Amazon Prime member and since I buy a lot of items from Amazon, the two day free shipping is something that keeps me coming back. I must admit however that I also bounce each purchase off of Ebay because you can often find cheaper items there and you do not have to usually pay the tax there. Also Ebay offers Ebay Bucks for most purchases that accumulate quarterly and you can use those bucks towards any purchase sometimes getting things for free. The shipping usually takes a few days longer to get to you but if it is something I don't need right away, I will go to Ebay instead of Amazon. It's also usually a little tougher if you have a problem with a purchase because the hoops you have to jump through at Ebay, make it more of a pain that Amazon which is very liberal in it's return policy. With Amazon now trying to get into groceries, I cannot wait to see how this shakes out.
title: “Can't Go Wrong with Amazon”

Returns are just as easy, however, if you return something that 'you did not like' as apposed to does not work or was not what the description stated, they take the return cost out of your refund. When you request a return, they send you an email with a shipping form to print. I use Amazon a lot, but I also do a 'google' search for the product to be sure it is the best price. I find in most cases when you add the shipping from the other vendor Amazon comes out lower. And I keep in mind the easy return process.

content: I love Amazon. Since I despise shopping, this is a great option. Jeff Besos is a genius, of course. His idea for customer service relations is a business model every on-line seller should use: generally, no questions asked return. And the response time is within seconds of asking for a return phone call or email. The only thing I do not like is a part of the Amazon Prime program. I've found that when I use Prime to shop, the item is generally higher than if I bought it through another vendor. The trick may be their free 2-day shipping promise. Other vendors may take longer to ship, but the cost is often much less. For example, if you look for a book and it's $18 on Amazon with free shipping, you may be able to find the same one for $5 plus shipping of about $3.. That could be a lot less expense for you. But the "free shipping" idea makes the buyer more likely to purchase it through Amazon. Plus the fact that you've paid your $$ up front for Prime services, would probably make a buyer use Amazon Prime services.  It's a rather tricky marketing tool, but it works for them. It's sort of the "you pay me now or you pay me later" mentality.
title: “Love Amazon - but they're practically taking over all shopping”

content: I order from Amazon weekly, if not more often, and am amazed at the swift delivery, the ease of returns, and the amazing breadth of products offered.  My only concern has been with the packaging a few times--I ordered some liquid garden products that included organic pest control.  That came in a large box that also included a WaterPik & accessories.  The bottles of garden products leaked all over the box and other contents, and it leaked all over the postal carrier's vehicle.  Amazon replace the items, which was nice, but the stink and aggravation was unwelcome...  No edible or health care products ever should be packed with pest control products--no commonsense there!  On another occasion, I ordered a three-jar pack of Lingonberries.  These were bound together in a manner that would suggest safety, but the middle jar was smashed and leaked sticky goo all over everything else in the box--insufficient packing material had been used--those air pillows had shifted all over, the box was too large, and it seemed, again, that commonsense was absent in the packing process.  Amazon always replaces items such as this, but they could save money and time and customer anger if a little more "thought" went into the  packing process.  If robots pack, however, they need to be programmed accordingly ;)
title: “Frequent 'Flyer"”

content:
I am very seasoned consumer on Amazon and have just experienced a few watch outs.
Pay very close attention to small details especially when you need a product in a short time frame. Primarily, when the product is not coming from an Amazon fulfillment center.

In the last 2 weeks I had 2 orders bite me. One was coming direct from China and the other from India.

The China order was simply a pair of mini USB power cords, great price, 2 for $5.49. The deal was so great I missed the details, ordered at 8:00 PM, by 11:00 PM I was notified that the product was already shipped. Blown away, however, it was really shipped the next business day as it was coming from China. And it was sent regular mail. Goty the product 3 weeks later. So my haste cost me as I had ordered for a friend who required the product right away.

The order from India, also took 3 weeks, but this was goofy, maybe culture or whatever, they shipped the product registered mail. What a royal pain. I have product shipped to my condo in Florida and my neighbour puts the product away for me awaiting our return. UPS and FedEx are great, they know our place  always leave it where required. But registered mail, it became a nightmare.

Hope my short comings help you in the future.
title: “Shipping Tips”

Their customer service is excellent, and their prices are usually the lowest found anywhere. I am a loyal Amazonian...I love this company!

content:
I have had a great experience dealing with Amazon after 2 separate Stand up paddle
boards I ordered (with extremely discounted prices) were delivered damaged.
 I recommend contacting their support on live chat. The first order was promptly replaced with a another board. The second order was the last one of a old 2013 model. I wanted to keep it and was given a fair discount to pay for a professional surf shop repair.

These SUP boards were extremely large and I understand that transporting can easily lead to damage by the shippers that Amazon can not control.

I recommend not try to call them but use their live e-chat and contact them as soon as you open your package and you will receive excellent support!
title: “Good customer support after delivered items were damaged”

content:
I'm a tough one to please when it comes to online buying & selling, but Amazon deserves 5 stars.   As a buyer: You're dealing with multiple sellers. Amazon is more like the watchdog. They hold the sellerz to high standards & it works out well. I've never had a problem with any orders. The prices are decent & the quality has always been as I expected. I buy often, especially at Christmas so it was worth it for me to buy the Prime membership. The bonus is that you get a LOT of free movies you can watch on TV (like Netflix), plus movies you can buy right from the TV. I've gotten several popular ones for $10-15.

As a seller: You have to keep in mind that they do take a commission & price accordingly. A little tip- don't price anything below $8. As long as you're honest in your description, taking pictures if needed, you'll be fine. They make it easy to have your item listed in 5 minutes. They even suggest a price range based on others that are listed. When we decided to down scale & got rid of a lot of stuff I was making $90 a day. A lot more than I would have gotten at a yard sale. I'm helping my brother in law get rid of his books. He has over 200, way more than I can store. With Amazon all I do is list them, & with one little checkmark I notify Amazon that I want them to take over. They have me print out a label & I box & ship them for them to handle. They store them, ship them, collect the money, handle any customer questions & notify me of what I've sold & my profit. The money is deposited right to my bank account. You can do this with anything you sell.
title: “Great site to shop & sell!”

content:
Amazon.com is most likely the best online marketplace you'll ever encounter!

Jeff Bezos, the creator of Amazon.com had many complaints on where to find specific items, especially the rare ones, but didn't have time to look at all the stores and online shopping sites for them. He spent many years trying to figure out why, and then it suddenly hit him. He realized there was no such place to buy everything the world has to offer.

He then spent many years in website development until he came across a rather unusual phenomenon. The place he was dreaming of was right before his eyes, and with that in mind, he decided to become the founder of such a project. He spent many days trying to come up with a good international name for the company, and then finally decided to name it after one of the most restricted places in all of South America - Amazon (based off the Amazon River).

The website's focus has, and always has been the practice and motto of the customer always being right, making it the best place to find exactly what you need, even if they don't necessarily sell what you're looking for 100% in the United States. In fact, many useful products that are imports are being sold to authorized United States retailers today, some of which the seller has opted to allow Amazon to fulfill the delivery of the products.

Although the site has a good reputation, there are sometimes criminals that create fake merchant IDs to either steal your money, or otherwise provide you with counterfeit products in your order. For this kind of case, Amazon.com had created the A-to-Z Safe Buying Guarantee, to help protect buyers from potential fraudulent sellers. Even criminals who close their Amazon.com accounts before the order is complete can still be subject to the system, as the seller ID remains on Amazon.com servers until the 60-day A-to-Z claim filing period has passed, making this the safest place to buy with confidence.

If you're ever looking for a hard to find item, who knows! It just may be on Amazon! I'd highly recommend it!
title: “What to Look for while Shopping”

content:
When it comes to finding a slimming belt that gives you that highly-coveted flat tummy, while providing the conditions your body needs to burn off excess fat, most waist trimmers fall short of the mark. 
Personally, I've tried a number of slimming belts in the past, and found that the majority are either too tight and uncomfortable to allow for a proper workout, or so absorbent that it felt as though I was carrying around a week's worth of sweat!

This waist trimmer is an incredibly well-made neoprene belt (with rubber lining), that's been backed by a lifetime warranty for even greater piece of mind. Both the 9" width and 42" length are suited for a wide range of sizes. In fact, both myself and my wife can use the same slimming belt! What's more, the placement and strength of the Velcro fastenings are ideal for great support and no unwanted chafing. 

The first time I wore this waist trimmer, it wicked away moisture so quickly that I didn't even take it off for SIX hours. At first, I thought it was another failure that didn't work because I didn't feel wet in the slightest - even after jumping rope. However, when I removed the belt I was actually dripping with sweat underneath, even though the slimming belt itself dried out almost immediately when laid aside. 
One of the best things about this waist trimmer is that the design helps to keep me mindful of my posture, and keeps me tightening my abs throughout a workout. What's more, as a slimming belt, it provides a surprising amount of back support, while appearing to give me a flatter (more attractive) stomach. 

Unfortunately, if you're thinking that this slimming belt will raise your metabolism and shed pounds for you without diet and exercise then you're going to be disappointed. The truth is that no waist trimmer works like that. Instead, you use your slimming belt while exercising to improve your core temperature, which enriches circulation and leads to great metabolic changes. Rather than losing belly fat instantly, you might lose temporary water weight which you'll then regain. However, your workouts will be more effective, and you might be able to achieve the ideal body faster. I know it's working for me!
title: “Best Waist Trimmer for the money by a long shot.”

content:
If I can't find it on Amazon I figure I don't really need it.  I'm a prime member and I love the two day shipping, the prime video, and all the other benefits.  

You have to really pay attention with items that have different colors or fabrics, etc. the prices can and usually do vary.  You may want the black shoes in an 8 but the blue shoes might be significantly cheaper. (Example)

I've got a kindle fire and love the ease of ordering books thru Amazon.  There are just so many features and benefits that I'm certain I don't use them all. 

As with anything, shop around, even within the site. Prices do vary by vender, color, sizes, fabrics, et.al. 

It's truly my favorite place to shop and I also go just to read the verified purchase reviews on something I might purchase in the future.
title: “Amazon....oh how I adore you!”

content:
If you've owned a bird, you know they like to chew on things. It is good for them at stimulates them and keeps their beak sharp.
This rainbow bridge bird toy is very nice for birds the size of a cockatiel or larger. It would be great for any parrots or macaws or cockatoos or something like that as well.
All of the pieces are made of natural wood that are on the bridge their flat pieces and then there are round balls in between them. They are strong with a stick a leather. The only pieces I really do not care for on this toy are the chain links. They are just a hollow plastic material. I do not think those will hold up very well. The rest of the toys made very well.
It is 18 inches into end. From into it and I mean from the end of one clip to the end of the other clip. These quick clips are very nice you can hang this horizontally or vertically in your cage you can either it is 18 inches into end. From into and I mean from the end of one clip to the end of the other clip. These quick clips are very nice you can hang this horizontally or vertically in your cage. You can hang it from the top of your cage by either and since there is a hook on each end. It is a pretty sturdy clip so will hold up. Also, since there is a hook on each and you can turn it over to have either end of the top.
This would not be long enough to go side to side across a birdcage that would hold a larger bird. However, this would work diagonally in a cage going from the side to the back or from the front to the side.
Most birdcages have a perch across the cage. If this is the case with your bird it is probably best just to hang it vertically from the top of the cage towards the bottom of the cage. This way it would move more when they played with it.

Pros: bright colors, natural wood to chew, sturdy clips on each end.

Cons: Plastic chain pieces will break easily with a large bird.
title: “cool bird toys”

content:
I've used Amazon more times that I can count. When I see something I want on another website, I look at Amazon first to see if they've got a better deal. Often, Amazon has better prices, and they've got plenty of brands to choose from and lots of reviews to look at. 
It's wise to look into the company you're ordering from if it's not directly through Amazon, because the products may not be good quality. However, I've ordered indirectly through Amazon many times and I've been perfectly happy with what I've gotten. Also, take a look at the shipping time, because I've ordered several things from China before through Amazon and it took a month to get to my house. I didn't mind waiting, but some do.
Overall, Amazon is a great place to shop around for deals, and they've got a great selection. I'll definitely be buying from them again and I'd recommend it to anybody.

content: Joined as a Prime member almost a year ago and have not regretted it once! Two day shipping...HELLO!  Lightning Deals and a Savings deal section is awesome! I have even receieved a few free items from certain sellers after making a purchase from them and leaving an honest review. All unexpected and appreaciated. I have had some bad shipping incidents where Amazon or the seller could have done better but those issues were resolved. Im so pleased with them I wish I could buy into the company.

content: Want a site that you can trust, even if you don't trust the vendor?  Amazon has got your back!  I ordered some shoes that said they were leather.  I didn't want synthetic and made that a criteria in my search.  The description stated they were leather, but when they arrived, they were synthetic leather.  I called the vendor that night, very upset and demanded they take them back.  They sent me a return authorization, but when I saw the credit issued, I went through the roof.  Not only did they charge me the shipping (they said they wouldn't), but they only refunded me the lower price of the synthetic, not the more expensive leather.  Meanwhile, the vendor got busy and went to their Amazon listing and changed the description of the shoes.  After several phone calls and going in circles with the vendor, I contacted Amazon.  They pulled up the order, verified the description at the time of purchase and the amount charged and refunded, and when I hung up the phone I had my full purchase price refunded to me including the shipping!  They also told me whenever I have a problem with an order, go to Amazon Customer Care and they will deal with the vendor.  Now that is peace of mind!
title: “Easy Peasy Shopping”

content:
Not only do they get over 90% of my orders on time or sooner, but they get the remainder within 2/3 business days and these are usually due to circumstances outside their control. To top it all off they offer shipping cost refunds for those orders! They are quick to respond and assist and they have great customer service. Definitely recommend.

However, steer clear from their credit card. Not really owned by Amazon and their support is awful.
